hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT Projects.IdProject as Id, Projects.Name, Projects.Description, Projects.Identifier, Projects.IsPrivate, Projects.CreatedOn, Projects.CreatedBy, Projects.UpdatedOn, Projects.UpdateBy FROM Projects INNER JOIN ProjectMembers ON Projects.IdProject = ProjectMembers.IdProject WHERE ProjectMembers.UserId = :userId ORDER BY Projects.Name ASC
